The EU's hunt for critical mineralsThe European Union's law to guarantee a supply of minerals crucial for its green and digital transitions and to end its dependence on Chinese supply will enter force early next year after securing final approval this month. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 09:01:18 GMT F4TNLGOVEFPKFDS6F2FKNJAXS4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/eus-hunt-ritic-minerals-2023-12-18/Reuters市场商品
EU sets critical mineral goals, but faces struggle to hit themThe European Union has set targets to dig up, recycle and refine lithium, cobalt and other metals it needs for its green transition, but a shortage of new money, crippling energy costs and local opposition could put them beyond reach. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:55:56 GMT UW6JINPHFLNHOFUTLWPXYYGTE https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/eu-sets-ritic-mineral-goals-faces-struggle-hit-them-2023-12-18/Philip Blenkinsop市场商品
US sees no impact on Vietnam ties from Hanoi-Beijing defence pledgesThe United States will continue to closely cooperate with Vietnam, a U.S. official said after Hanoi announced last week strengthened ties with China, including on defence and security, as the two great powers compete for influence. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:14:56 GMT 5DYO2KLW7FJBNEJF3RU735K6LQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us-sees-no-impact-vietnam-ties-hanoi-beijing-defence-pledges-2023-12-18/Francesco Guarascio世界
China banks step up sales of bad loans as consumer defaults riseChinese banks are putting bad loans up for sale at a record pace, as regulators push for faster disposal of sour debts amid rising consumer defaults during an ailing post-COVID economic recovery. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:11:18 GMT ZPNW3WPZ3ZM5HJZCMSUXJQHIQI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-banks-step-up-sales-bad-loans-consumer-defaults-rise-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中国
Rare snowfall in southern China as deep freeze grips the northThe cold weather sweeping China brought rare snowfall on Monday as far south as the province of Guangdong, while temperatures in the chilly north plunged to near historic lows for the month. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:56:26 GMT AMGPOTNINFIDNJSSC4RSI2CXUI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rare-snowfall-southern-china-deep-freeze-grips-north-2023-12-18/Liz Lee, Ryan Woo世界中国
Tencent turns to ByteDance in gaming showdown with NetEaseTencent Holdings is relying on one-time bitter rival ByteDance to promote its most important video game release in years, in a sign of warming relations as well as intensifying competition as China's gaming industry returns to growth. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:15:48 GMT 4WFXVOYPY5OSZLLRV5YSB6MUSU https://www.reuters.com/technology/tencent-turns-bytedance-gaming-showdown-with-netease-2023-12-18/Josh Ye技术
